metadata.title: CVE-2024-35845 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: dbg-tlv: ensure NUL terminationThe iwl_fw_ini_debug_info_tlv is used as a string, so we mustensure the string is terminated correctly before using it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
